content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 1, Everton 2.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 1, Everton 2.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Kurt Zouma.
Substitution, Everton. Mason Holgate replaces Yannick Bolasie because of an injury.
Phil Jagielka (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Saido Berahino (Stoke City).
Attempt missed. Theo Walcott (Everton) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Idrissa Gueye.
Foul by Michael Keane (Everton).
Saido Berahino (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Everton. Morgan Schneiderlin replaces Wayne Rooney.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Joe Allen (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Leighton Baines.
Goal!  Stoke City 1, Everton 2. Cenk Tosun (Everton) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Theo Walcott with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Theo Walcott (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Cenk Tosun with a cross.
Phil Jagielka (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Badou Ndiaye (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Goal!  Stoke City 1, Everton 1. Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting (Stoke City) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Joe Allen following a set piece situation.
Foul by Cenk Tosun (Everton).
Joe Allen (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Substitution, Stoke City. Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting replaces Ramadan Sobhi.
Goal!  Stoke City 0, Everton 1. Cenk Tosun (Everton) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
Attempt blocked. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) right footed shot from very close range is blocked.

Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Jack Butland.
Attempt saved. Michael Keane (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Wayne Rooney.
